description:
New single storey teaching building on the sports pitch adjacent to the Islington and Finsbury youth club, with replacement rooftop sports pitch and screened enclosure. New external staircase to courtyard area and provision of steel framed cycle store.

This application may affect the character and appearance of a conservation area and the setting of a listed building.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); Section 67 and 73.
site_name: City And Islington College Centre For Applied Sciences
decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
